HUMAN RESOURCE & MANAGEMENT
---------------------------

### **Faculty Members**

Our Human Resource & Management lecturers specialize in talent management, organizational behavior, and leadership strategies. They bring a blend of research expertise and real-world application to help students excel in managing people and businesses.
